column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Ramen here okay priced ($15-20 per person). I've had better ramen in SoCal for half the price. If you expect authentic Ramen coming to JINYA
column2: you're bound to be sorely disappointed. There's MSG in the broth
column3: lots of fusion (which I'm fine with)
column4: and the Ramen lacks the chewiness and perfection in texture that Japan is famous for.
